items: **Aquatic Adaptation.** You can breathe water; you have a Swim Speed equal to your Speed.
**Natural Armor.** Your AC is 13 + your Dexterity or Constitution modifier (choose when you take the feat). You can still use a shield.
**Natural Weapons.** You can make Unarmed Strikes that deal 1d8 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (as appropriate).
**Night Vision.** You have Darkvision 60 ft. (if you already have Darkvision, its range increases by 30 ft.).

feat.name: Charm Twister
entries: **Old Blessing.** You can cast *bless* once per long rest, targeting only creatures carrying a wicker charm you’ve woven; you can also cast it using spell slots. Choose Int/Wis/Cha as your spellcasting ability when you take this feat.
**Wicker Weaving.** During a short rest, you can craft a simple wicker charm from available materials.

feat.name: Crimson Ritualist
entries: You learn the **Blood Bolt** cantrip.
You gain access to minor blood rituals; certain named rites can be cast as rituals even if they lack the ritual tag (per the Player PDF).

feat.name: Cult Initiate
entries: Gain proficiency in **Religion** or **Deception** (your choice).
You can cast *find familiar* as a ritual.
You have cult contacts who can provide information or minor aid (as described in the feat).

feat.name: Dread Speech
entries: **Eldritch Words.** As an Action, choose a creature within 30 feet that can hear you; it must succeed on a Wisdom save or has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn. Uses equal to PB per long rest.

feat.name: Fate Gambler
entries: Gain a pool of **gamble dice** (d4s) equal to your proficiency bonus. When you can see a d20 roll, you can add or subtract one die (per feat text). The pool refreshes on a long rest.

feat.name: Grave Keeper
entries: Gain proficiency with **mason’s tools** or an **herbalism kit** (your choice).
Advantage on checks to properly handle and tend to corpses.
A funerary rite feature that can calm the dead or sanctify ground (per feat text).

feat.name: Hunter of Hunters
entries: Gain proficiency in **Survival** or **Perception** (your choice).
Bonuses against creatures actively hunting sentient prey and tracking-related benefits (per feat text).

feat.name: Memory Starved
entries: After a long rest, select a limited **knack** from the list in the feat, representing resurfacing memories (per feat text).

feat.name: Reveling Fool
entries: While celebrating, you have resistance to being **Charmed**.
Advantage on certain Charisma checks at festivities.
After at least 1 hour of revelry, you can shrug off **one level of exhaustion** (per feat text).

feat.name: Unreflected
entries: You cast no reflection; mirrors and reflective surfaces interact with you in specific ways, providing niche benefits and drawbacks (per feat text).

feat.name: Death Defier
entries: You gain a bonus to **death saving throws**.
Once per long rest, when damage would reduce you to 0 hit points, you can drop to **1 hit point** instead.
